sections.heading: Repealed.Section 21-1A-2 - Repealed.Section 21-1A-3 - Repealed.Section 21-1A-4 - Repealed.Section 21-1A-5 - Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 1989, ch. 390, § 1; repealed by Laws 1989, ch. 390, § 6.

Repeals.— Laws 1989, ch. 390, § 6 repealed 21-1A-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1989, ch. 390, § 1, relating to the short title of the University Endowment Act, effective July 1, 2000. For provisions of former section,seethe 1999 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
